page.title: 05CLUBS:FENNY COMPTON.
page.content: The largest group is the{OVER SIXTIES a large number of those over the age of 60 who meet regularly in the Village Hall for social events, cups of tea,whist drives, and also arrange coach outings and holidays for their members.The {BOWLING CLUB }has a rink in a corner of the school playing field,and there are {FOOTBALL} and {CRICKET CLUBS,} and a private {TENNIS court.{BROWNIES & CUBS } meet weekly, ans each {PUBLIC HOUSE }has a darts team.The parents and friends of the children at school belong to the PTA - called the {FRIENDS OF FENNY COMPTON {SCHOOL,} and they organise various activities such as Family Evenings _ with dancing, sherry, mince pies (at Xmas) games & entertainments. The {YOUNG FARMERS } also run monthly meetings at the George & Dragon Public House at the Wharf by the Oxford Canal
